resources.string: Please connect one of the following serial adapters: PL2303, CP21xx, FT232 or FT312.
This option will enable collecting debug information. You can later review it by yourself or send to the developer.
View debug information in your favourite editor.

By clicking this option you can send debug information to the developer. Don\'t worry, no personal information is sent. You can always review the file that will be sent by clicking \"View debug\" option, or even download source code of this application and review it. It is Open Source!
You can clear debug information if it is not needed anymore. This will allow you to save storage space.
